content:
l class="ul1">
  • when schedops.LEG.FN_NUMBER between “100” and “999” then “International”
  • when `schedops.LEG.FN_NUMBER` between “1100” and “1999” then “International”
  • when `schedops.LEG.FN_NUMBER` between “3000” and “3999” then “International”
  • when `schedops.LEG.FN_NUMBER` between “5000” and “6799” then “International”
  • when `schedops.LEG.FN_NUMBER` between “6800” and “8879” then “Domestic”
  • when `schedops.LEG.FN_NUMBER` between “9000” and “9999” then “Domestic”
  • else “Non-Commercial”
    • | |alternativeAirport| | | | | | extraInfo| | | | | | distance|`schedops.ALTERNATE_AIRPORTS`| |`DISTANCE`| | | iata|`schedops.ALTERNATE_AIRPORTS`| |`iata_alternate`| | | priority|`schedops.ALTERNATE_AIRPORTS`| |`PRIORITY_ALTERN`| | | arrivalAirport|`schedops.ALTERNATE_AIRPORTS`| |`iata_ap_code`| | # Flight Leg Times Data Model ### Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Scope * Retrieve records where `schedops.LEG.ENTRY_DT` >= Last Data Retrieval Date and `schedops.LEG_TIMES.what_if` = “_“ and `schedops.LEG_TIMES.USAGE` = (“A“ or “F“ or “M“) #### - Source Query * `Riverx_FlightLegTimes_Query` #### - Data Retrieval Trigger & Steps **Trigger**: Every minute **Steps**: Execute `Riverx_FlightLegTimes_Query` query. #### - Change Data Capture Operation * Unique Key: A composite key combining `legId`, `type` and `source`(see Mapping for details). * Insert and update operations are carried out using Unique Key. * No delete operation is performed; instead, `status`(see Mapping for details) is updated based on the retrieved data. ### Mapping |Model Attribute|Source Table|Source Field|Detail| |:----|:----|:---
